item.title: Dakota Mortensen and Brooks Nader Respond After They're Caught Seemingly Flirting at “Mormon Wives” Season 3 Launch Party
item.description: Mortensen previously dated 'The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' star Taylor Frankie Paul, and the two share a son, Ever True, together

item.title: Justin Baldoni Files Motion Asking Judge to Throw Out Blake Lively's Case Against Him amid Ongoing Legal Battle
item.description: Baldoni suggested that "no reasonable juror" would find him guilty, per a motion for summary judgment court filing obtained by PEOPLE

item.title: Kate Gosselin Shares How She Budgets to Buy Christmas Presents for Her 8 Kids During the Holiday Season
item.description: The mom of 8 opened up about how she approaches the Christmas season with her family

item.title: Eddie Murphy Believes He was Blacklisted by the Academy After Talking about Racism at the 1988 Oscars
item.description: Murphy presented the award for best motion picture at the 60th Academy Awards and spoke about racism in the film industry

item.title: Oprah’s Favorite Slippers Feel Like ‘Cozy Gloves’ for Your Feet — Gift a Pair and Keep a Pair While They’re $50
item.description: According to Oprah, they “spring back energy with every step”
